label: Imported
description: First time import into the database

label: NOT listed
description: Imported but automatically rejected because the journal was NOT listed

label: Duplicate, not imported
description: Article already in database with same topic.  Not re-imported.

label: Summary topic added
description: Article already in database.  New summary topic added.

label: Replaced
description: Article record replaced from updated, newly downloaded, source record

label: Error
description: An error occurred in locating or parsing the record.  Not imported.
